description: SIOC (Semantically-Interlinked Online Communities) is an ontology for describing the information in online communities. This information can be used to export information from online communities and to link them together. The scope of the application areas that SIOC can be used for includes (and is not limited to) weblogs, message boards, mailing lists and chat channels.
label: SIOC Core Ontology Namespace

content.description: The content of the Item in plain text format.
content.label: content

content_encoded.description: The encoded content of the Post, contained in CDATA areas.
content_encoded.label: content encoded

created_at.description: When this was created, in ISO 8601 format.
created_at.label: created at

delivered_at.description: When this was delivered, in ISO 8601 format.
delivered_at.label: delivered at

email_sha1.description: An electronic mail address of the UserAccount, encoded using SHA1.
email_sha1.label: email sha1

first_name.description: First (real) name of this User. Synonyms include given name or christian name.
first_name.label: first name

id.description: An identifier of a SIOC concept instance. For example, a user ID. Must be unique for instances of each type of SIOC concept within the same site.
id.label: id

ip_address.description: The IP address used when creating this Item, UserAccount, etc. This can be associated with a creator. Some wiki articles list the IP addresses for the creator or modifiers when the usernames are absent.
ip_address.label: ip address

last_activity_date.description: The date and time of the last activity associated with a SIOC concept instance, and expressed in ISO 8601 format. This could be due to a reply Post or Comment, a modification to an Item, etc.
last_activity_date.label: last activity date

last_item_date.description: The date and time of the last Post (or Item) in a Forum (or a Container), in ISO 8601 format.
last_item_date.label: last item date

last_name.description: Last (real) name of this user. Synonyms include surname or family name.
last_name.label: last name

last_reply_date.description: The date and time of the last reply Post or Comment, which could be associated with a starter Item or Post or with a Thread, and expressed in ISO 8601 format.
last_reply_date.label: last reply date

modified_at.description: When this was modified, in ISO 8601 format.
modified_at.label: modified at

name.description: The name of a SIOC concept instance, e.g. a username for a UserAccount, group name for a Usergroup, etc.
name.label: name

note.description: A note associated with this resource, for example, if it has been edited by a UserAccount.
note.label: note

num_authors.description: The number of unique authors (UserAccounts and unregistered posters) who have contributed to this Item, Thread, Post, etc.
num_authors.label: num authors

num_items.description: The number of Posts (or Items) in a Forum (or a Container).
num_items.label: num items

num_replies.description: The number of replies that this Item, Thread, Post, etc. has. Useful for when the reply structure is absent.
num_replies.label: num replies

num_threads.description: The number of Threads (AKA discussion topics) in a Forum.
num_threads.label: num threads

num_views.description: The number of times this Item, Thread, UserAccount profile, etc. has been viewed.
num_views.label: num views

read_at.description: When this was read, in ISO 8601 format.
read_at.label: read at

subject.description: Keyword(s) describing subject of the Post.
subject.label: subject

title.description: This is the title (subject line) of the Post. Note that for a Post within a threaded discussion that has no parents, it would detail the topic thread.
title.label: title

about.description: Specifies that this Item is about a particular resource, e.g. a Post describing a book, hotel, etc.
about.label: about

account_of.description: Refers to the foaf:Agent or foaf:Person who owns this sioc:UserAccount.
account_of.label: account of

addressed_to.description: Refers to who (e.g. a UserAccount, e-mail address, etc.) a particular Item is addressed to.
addressed_to.label: addressed to

administrator_of.description: A Site that the UserAccount is an administrator of.
administrator_of.label: administrator of

has_administrator.description: A UserAccount that is an administrator of this Site.
has_administrator.label: has administrator

attachment.description: The URI of a file attached to an Item.
attachment.label: attachment

avatar.description: An image or depiction used to represent this UserAccount.
avatar.label: avatar

container_of.description: An Item that this Container contains.
container_of.label: container of

has_container.description: The Container to which this Item belongs.
has_container.label: has container

creator_of.description: A resource that the UserAccount is a creator of.
creator_of.label: creator of

has_creator.description: This is the UserAccount that made this resource.
has_creator.label: has creator

discussion_of.description: The Item that this discussion is about.
discussion_of.label: discussion of

has_discussion.description: A discussion that is related to this Item. The discussion can be anything, for example, a sioc:Forum or sioc:Thread, a sioct:WikiArticle or simply a foaf:Document.
has_discussion.label: has discussion

email.description: An electronic mail address of the UserAccount.
email.label: email

embeds_knowledge.description: This links Items to embedded statements, facts and structured content.
embeds_knowledge.label: embeds knowledge

feed.description: A feed (e.g. RSS, Atom, etc.) pertaining to this resource (e.g. for a Forum, Site, UserAccount, etc.).
feed.label: feed

follows.description: Indicates that one UserAccount follows another UserAccount (e.g. for microblog posts or other content item updates).
follows.label: follows

function_of.description: A UserAccount that has this Role.
function_of.label: function of

has_function.description: A Role that this UserAccount has.
has_function.label: has function

generator.description: A URI for the application used to generate this Item.
generator.label: generator

has_host.description: The Site that hosts this Container.
has_host.label: has host

has_space.description: A data Space which this resource is a part of.
has_space.label: has space

host_of.description: A Container that is hosted on this Site.
host_of.label: host of

has_member.description: A UserAccount that is a member of this Usergroup.
has_member.label: has member

member_of.description: A Usergroup that this UserAccount is a member of.
member_of.label: member of

has_moderator.description: A UserAccount that is a moderator of this Forum.
has_moderator.label: has moderator

moderator_of.description: A Forum that a UserAccount is a moderator of.
moderator_of.label: moderator of

has_modifier.description: A UserAccount that modified this resource (e.g. Item, Container, Space).
has_modifier.label: has modifier

modifier_of.description: A resource that this UserAccount has modified.
modifier_of.label: modifier of

has_owner.description: A UserAccount that this resource is owned by.
has_owner.label: has owner

owner_of.description: A resource owned by a particular UserAccount, for example, a weblog or image gallery.
owner_of.label: owner of

has_parent.description: A Container or Forum that this Container or Forum is a child of.
has_parent.label: has parent

parent_of.description: A child Container or Forum that this Container or Forum is a parent of.
parent_of.label: parent of

has_part.description: An resource that is a part of this subject.
has_part.label: has part

part_of.description: A resource that the subject is a part of.
part_of.label: part of

has_reply.description: Points to an Item or Post that is a reply or response to this Item or Post.
has_reply.label: has reply

related_to.description: Related resources for this resource, e.g. for Posts, perhaps determined implicitly from topics or references.
related_to.label: related to

reply_of.description: Links to an Item or Post which this Item or Post is a reply to.
reply_of.label: reply of

has_scope.description: A resource that this Role applies to.
has_scope.label: has scope

scope_of.description: A Role that has a scope of this resource.
scope_of.label: scope of

space_of.description: A resource which belongs to this data Space.
space_of.label: space of

has_subscriber.description: A UserAccount that is subscribed to this Container.
has_subscriber.label: has subscriber

subscriber_of.description: A Container that a UserAccount is subscribed to.
subscriber_of.label: subscriber of

has_usergroup.description: Points to a Usergroup that has certain access to this Space.
has_usergroup.label: has usergroup

usergroup_of.description: A Space that the Usergroup has access to.
usergroup_of.label: usergroup of

latest_version.description: Links to the latest revision of this Item or Post.
latest_version.label: latest version

likes.description: Used to indicate some form of endorsement by a UserAccount or Agent of an Item, Container, Space, UserAccount, etc.
likes.label: likes

link.description: A URI of a document which contains this SIOC object.
link.label: link

links_to.description: Links extracted from hyperlinks within a SIOC concept, e.g. Post or Site.
links_to.label: links to

mentions.description: Refers to a UserAccount that a particular Item mentions.
mentions.label: mentions

next_by_date.description: Next Item or Post in a given Container sorted by date.
next_by_date.label: next by date

previous_by_date.description: Previous Item or Post in a given Container sorted by date.
previous_by_date.label: previous by date

next_version.description: Links to the next revision of this Item or Post.
next_version.label: next version

previous_version.description: Links to the previous revision of this Item or Post.
previous_version.label: previous version

reference.description: Links either created explicitly or extracted implicitly on the HTML level from the Post.
reference.label: reference

respond_to.description: For the reply-to address set in email messages, IMs, etc. The property name was chosen to avoid confusion with has_reply/reply_of (the reply graph).
respond_to.label: respond to

shared_by.description: For shared Items where there is a certain creator_of and an intermediary who shares or forwards it (e.g. as a sibling Item).
shared_by.label: shared by

topic.description: A topic of interest, linking to the appropriate URI, e.g. in the Open Directory Project or of a SKOS category.
topic.label: topic

Community.description: Community is a high-level concept that defines an online community and what it consists of.
Community.label: Community

Item.description: An Item is something which can be in a Container.
Item.label: Item

Role.description: A Role is a function of a UserAccount within a scope of a particular Forum, Site, etc.
Role.label: Role

UserAccount.description: A user account in an online community site.
UserAccount.label: User Account

Container.description: An area in which content Items are contained.
Container.label: Container

Usergroup.description: A set of UserAccounts whose owners have a common purpose or interest. Can be used for access control purposes.
Usergroup.label: Usergroup

Forum.description: A discussion area on which Posts or entries are made.
Forum.label: Forum

Space.description: A Space is a place where data resides, e.g. on a website, desktop, fileshare, etc.
Space.label: Space

Post.description: An article or message that can be posted to a Forum.
Post.label: Post

Site.description: A Site can be the location of an online community or set of communities, with UserAccounts and Usergroups creating Items in a set of Containers. It can be thought of as a web-accessible data Space.
Site.label: Site

Thread.description: A container for a series of threaded discussion Posts or Items.
Thread.label: Thread
